title: WTB- John McGraw w/ Cap PSA 2-4
author: Ct94122

posts.post_title: WTB- John McGraw w/ Cap PSA 2-4
posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase my last T206 Hall of Famer  (minus some high end) - looking for a t206 McGraw with cap- common back preferred - PSA slabbed only-2-4 graded,  

Thanks to all who have helped my quest- I appreciate all the collectors here. 

Cris
